events.title: DevOps Flowthon
events.description: National-level 3-day DevOps workshop and 24-hour Flowthon covering CI/CD, automation, containerization, cloud deployment and a hands-on DevOps hackathon where teams implemented pipelines, automated infrastructure and deployed scalable applications.
events.shortDesc: National-level DevOps workshop with CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, IaC and 24-hour hackathon
events.fullDescription: A comprehensive 3-day DevOps workshop followed by a 24-hour Flowthon (hackathon) covering the complete DevOps lifecycle. Workshop topics include Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, AWS services (CodeCommit, CodePipeline, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, CloudFormation), Infrastructure as Code, auto-scaling, and load balancing. The Flowthon involved 100 participants from 6 colleges competing to implement CI/CD pipelines, automate infrastructure, and deploy scalable applications. Conducted by Sai Pavan Velidandla, an experienced trainer with 13+ years of expertise.
events.venue: Digital Learning Center, EEE 4th Floor, SRKR Engineering College, Bhimavaram
events.location: Chinamiram Rural, Bhimavaram, Andhra Pradesh, India
events.organisingBody: SRKR Engineering College (Autonomous), SRKREC CSI Student Branch in association with Brainovision Solutions India Pvt. Ltd.

collegesInvolved: Sasi Institute of Technology and Engineering

resourcePerson.name: Sai Pavan Velidandla
resourcePerson.bio: 13+ years of training experience; trained 3.5 lakh+ professionals across corporates, universities and government bodies; expert in programming, full-stack, databases, cloud, no-code tools; creator of Derive Thinking and IQECC.

facultyCoordinators: Dr. K. Kishore Raju (Associate Professor, IT)
events.convenor: Dr. P. Ravi Kiran Varma, Professor & HOD, IT
chiefPatrons: Sri P. Krishnam Raju (Honorary Chairman, Governing Body Member)
patrons: Dr. K.S.V. Narasimha Raju (Governing Body Member, SRKREC)
Dr. K.V. Murali Krishnam Raju (Principal, SRKREC)
Sri S. Vital Ranga Raju (Vice President, SRKREC)
Sri G. Rama Raju (Vice President, SRKREC)
Sri S. Satya Pratik Varma (Governing Body Member, SRKREC)

day1.title: DevOps Fundamentals & CI/CD Pipeline Setup
sessions: Introduction to DevOps: definition, history, evolution, importance; DevOps lifecycle
Cloud computing overview: IaaS, PaaS, SaaS and AWS for DevOps
Tools overview: Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform
Hands-on with Git and AWS account setup with IAM basics

day2.title: AWS DevOps & Containerization
sessions: DevOps on AWS: CodeCommit, CodePipeline, CodeBuild, CodeDeploy, CloudFormation
Containerization overview and introduction to Docker, Amazon ECS and EKS
Deploy CI/CD pipeline on AWS using CodeBuild and CodeDeploy

day3.title: Infrastructure as Code & Advanced Scaling
sessions: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and CloudFormation
Advanced scaling: auto-scaling groups, load balancing, Elastic Beanstalk
Practical: IaC deployment and auto-scaling setup

highlights: 24-hour continuous hacking with structured slots for development, mentoring, presentations and evaluation
Peer evaluation where teams assessed each other's solutions

certificates: Certificate of Participation for all active participants
Certificate of Excellence (Merit Certificate) for winning teams
feedbackHighlights: Participants appreciated the resource person's clear explanations and depth of DevOps content
Students reported successful deployment using IaC and CloudFormation
Organizing team was frequently described as supportive and responsive
